name: Weapons Short of Destruction
description:
“A first person shooter arena game that supports up to four players in a chaotic, absurd physics-based shooting spree.”

Weapons Short of Destruction is a 1-4 player local co-op free-for-all first person shooter. Use fun physics-based weaponry to send your friends flying into traps. 

Controls: Left/Right analog sticks to move and look. Right trigger to shoot. A to jump.

Requires controllers (xbox works best) to play.
